data.sentence: The word وَعِنَبًا comes from the root ع ن ب and is associated with the meanings: to produce grapes, grape.

data.meanings: to cut off, strike with a rod, qadban - vegetable, edible plants.
data.sentence: The word وَقَضْبًا comes from the root ق ض ب and is associated with the meanings: to cut off, strike with a rod, qadban - vegetable, edible plants.
